html: BUDGET 2018 (1/2) 1) Largest ever increase in NHS spending, delivered without any rise in personal tax 2) Ending of austerity with increases in public spending, year on year, for the next 5 years 3) Tax cuts for 32 million people by raising personal tax allowances a year early
text:
BUDGET 2018 (1/2)

1) Largest ever increase in NHS spending, delivered without any rise in personal tax

2) Ending of austerity with increases in public spending, year on year, for the next 5 years

3) Tax cuts for 32 million people by raising personal tax allowances a year early

BUDGET 2018 (2/2)

4) An extra £1.7 billion to support people receiving Universal Credit

5) Plans for a new Digital Services Tax to ensure tech giants pay their fair share

html: We're making #upskirting a crime. Upskirting is a hideous invasion of privacy, but not all instances are currently covered by existing criminal law. Making it an offence is another step forward in challenging the sexist attitudes and behaviours in our society.pic.twitter.com/Sg61qfuTS3
text:
We're making #upskirting a crime.

Upskirting is a hideous invasion of privacy, but not all instances are currently covered by existing criminal law. Making it an offence is another step forward in challenging the sexist attitudes and behaviours in our society.pic.twitter.com/Sg61qfuTS3

html: Deeply saddened to hear that Dawn Sturgess has died at Salisbury District Hospital. I can assure the people of South Wiltshire that the police will be given all necessary resources to find out exactly what has transpired and bring those responsible to justice.
text: Deeply saddened to hear that Dawn Sturgess has died at Salisbury District Hospital. I can assure the people of South Wiltshire that the police will be given all necessary resources to find out exactly what has transpired and bring those responsible to justice.

html: I am appalled and shocked by the death of Dawn Sturgess, and my thoughts and condolences go to her family and loved ones. Police and security officials are working urgently to establish the facts of this incident, which is now being investigated as a murder.

html: My dad was a mounted PC with West Midlands Police. I’m very pleased to see that this new law will help to keep police horses and police dogs safe. Any attack on animals is horrific, but violence against service animals that are working to keep us safe is particularly sickening.pic.twitter.com/Tnc3lQvdn4
text:
My dad was a mounted PC with West Midlands Police. I’m very pleased to see that this new law will help to keep police horses and police dogs safe.
Any attack on animals is horrific, but violence against service animals that are working to keep us safe is particularly sickening.pic.twitter.com/Tnc3lQvdn4

html: Once home to 22,000 #elephants, Garamba National Park in DRC suffered from #poaching & #elephant population dropped to 1,200. text:
Once home to 22,000 #elephants, Garamba National Park in DRC suffered from #poaching & #elephant population dropped to 1,200. Thanks to the great work of @AfricanParks, poaching is down by 50% & local ppl are benefiting from conservation.

We need more success stories like this!pic.twitter.com/ZBzUBOfWG0

html: You can’t claim to respect NI devolution but then demand that it be ignored because an issue is “important”. The sensitivity about saying “the Republic of Ireland have done it so Northern Ireland should do it too” cannot be overstated either.
text:
You can’t claim to respect NI devolution but then demand that it be ignored because an issue is “important”. 

The sensitivity about saying “the Republic of Ireland have done it so Northern Ireland should do it too” cannot be overstated either.
